WADATUMI_MSG_001:
́Ugh... that scent is a sickening, yet familiar one.
It's the disgusting scent of a human, isn't it!
ā
You've some nerve, coming here to my home to disturb me... the Great Wadatsumi, God of the Seas!
WADATUMI_MSG_002:
́You are no ordinary human being are you, pesky human?
ā
Regardless of your strength... I have no plans to succumb to any filthy human.
ā
I, Wadatsumi, God of all planetary oceans, shall make you regret ever coming here!
WADATUMI_MSG_003:
́You're a persistent human, I'll give you that!
Let's see how many lives you've got to lose!
SYSTEM_MSG_001: Would you like to enter the wormhole and head back to your world?Ă
NPC_WADATUMI_REC: ̄Legendary monster that is the manifestation of the seas. Normally has a calm personality, but hates humans.
